content:
The chunk describes how the left mouse button is used for selecting and manipulating objects in the environment, including moving, rotating, rolling, and rescaling them, as well as introducing hotkeys for object control within the Direct Tools system.

The left mouse button is now used to select and manipulate objects in the environment. Once an object is selected, it may be moved and rotated.

Left Mouse Click Select an object Left Mouse + Middle Region Move object vertically Shift + Left Mouse + Middle Region Move object parallel to ground Left Mouse + Edge Region Rotate object around its pivot point Left Mouse + Corner Region Roll object around its pivot point Control + Left Mouse Rescale the model
